termsIntroductionContent: By accessing or using our website and AI trading platform, you ("User," "Investor") agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before registering or making any investment.
overviewOfServicesContent: Dragos Capital provides an AI-driven cryptocurrency trading platform that assists users in investing in crypto assets with the goal of achieving an average monthly return between 8% and 10% of the invested amount.
strategiesContent: All strategies are developed through market analysis, in-depth research, and extensive backtesting to optimize results.
investmentResponsibilityContent1: All investments made through Dragos Capital are entirely at the sole risk and responsibility of the User.
investmentResponsibilityContent2: Dragos Capital does not provide any guarantees regarding profits, capital protection, or performance outcomes.
investmentResponsibilityContent3: The User acknowledges and agrees that cryptocurrency markets are volatile and that Dragos Capital is not legally responsible for any financial losses, damages, or missed profits.
minimumInvestmentContent1: Initial capital investments are locked for six (6) months from the date of deposit.
minimumInvestmentContent2: Early withdrawal of initial capital before the end of this period will incur a 20% fee on the withdrawn amount.
minimumInvestmentContent3: Monthly profits (8–10%) may be withdrawn at any time without restriction.
cancellationPolicyContent1: Users may cancel their investment and withdraw their full balance within seven (7) days of registration with no fees.
cancellationPolicyContent2: After this period, the six-month holding rule and early withdrawal fee will apply.
riskDisclosureContent1: All investments carry risk. Past performance, strategy backtesting, and historical analysis do not guarantee future results.
riskDisclosureContent2: By investing through Dragos Capital, the User acknowledges full responsibility for their investment decisions and accepts that Dragos Capital will not be held liable for any losses, missed opportunities, or damages, whether direct or indirect.
riskDisclosureContent3: Users agree that Dragos Capital is not a financial advisor and does not provide personalized investment advice.
userObligationsContent1: Users must ensure all registration information provided is accurate.
userObligationsContent2: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials.
userObligationsContent3: Any misuse of the platform may result in account suspension or termination.
intellectualPropertyContent1: All content, technology, strategies, and branding remain the exclusive property of Dragos Capital.
intellectualPropertyContent2: Unauthorized reproduction, sharing, or commercial use of our proprietary systems is strictly prohibited.
intellectualPropertyContent3: All rights are reserved to Dragos Capital.
changesToTermsContent: Dragos Capital reserves the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
governingLawContent: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction], and any disputes shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of that jurisdiction.
termsWelcomeText: Welcome to Dragos Capital ("we," "our," "us"). By accessing or using our website and AI trading platform, you ("User," "Investor") agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before registering or making any investment.
section1Point1: Dragos Capital provides an AI-driven cryptocurrency trading platform that assists users in investing in crypto assets with the goal of achieving an average monthly return between 8% and 10% of the invested amount.
section1Point2: All strategies are developed through market analysis, in-depth research, and extensive backtesting to optimize results.
section2Point1: All investments made through Dragos Capital are entirely at the sole risk and responsibility of the User.
section2Point2: Dragos Capital does not provide any guarantees regarding profits, capital protection, or performance outcomes.
section2Point3: The User acknowledges and agrees that cryptocurrency markets are volatile and that Dragos Capital is not legally responsible for any financial losses, damages, or missed profits.
section3Point1: Initial capital investments are locked for six (6) months from the date of deposit.
section3Point2: Early withdrawal of initial capital before the end of this period will incur a 20% fee on the withdrawn amount.
section3Point3: Monthly profits (8–10%) may be withdrawn at any time without restriction.
section4Point1: Users may cancel their investment and withdraw their full balance within seven (7) days of registration with no fees.
section4Point2: After this period, the six-month holding rule and early withdrawal fee will apply.
section5Point1: All investments carry risk. Past performance, strategy backtesting, and historical analysis do not guarantee future results.
section5Point2: By investing through Dragos Capital, the User acknowledges full responsibility for their investment decisions and accepts that Dragos Capital will not be held liable for any losses, missed opportunities, or damages, whether direct or indirect.
section5Point3: Users agree that Dragos Capital is not a financial advisor and does not provide personalized investment advice.
section6Point1: Users must ensure all registration information provided is accurate.
section6Point2: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials.
section6Point3: Any misuse of the platform may result in account suspension or termination.
section7Point1: All content, technology, strategies, and branding remain the exclusive property of Dragos Capital.
section7Point2: Unauthorized reproduction, sharing, or commercial use of our proprietary systems is strictly prohibited.
section7Point3: All rights are reserved to Dragos Capital.
section8Content: Dragos Capital reserves the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
section9Content: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction], and any disputes shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of that jurisdiction.
privacyWelcomeText: At Dragos Capital ("we," "our," "us"), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect the data you provide when using our website and services. By accessing or using Dragos Capital, you agree to the practices described below.
privacySection1Intro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacySection1PointA1: Name, email address, phone number, and contact details
privacySection1PointA2: Identification documents (if required for compliance or verification)
privacySection1PointC1: IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system
privacySection1PointC2: Usage data related to your interaction with our platform
privacySection2Point2: Process deposits, withdrawals, and profit distributions
privacySection2Point3: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
privacySection2Point4: Improve our platform and trading services
privacySection2Point5: Meet legal, regulatory, and compliance requirements
privacySection2Point6: Send updates, newsletters, or promotional materials (only if you opt in)
privacySection3Intro: We will never sell your personal data. We may share your information only in the following cases:
privacySection3Point1: With service providers who assist in processing transactions, compliance checks, or platform operations
privacySection3Point2: To comply with legal obligations, regulatory requirements, or law enforcement requests
privacySection3Point3: In case of business transfer, such as a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacySection4Content: We use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Users are responsible for safeguarding their account credentials.
privacySection5Content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze platform performance, and deliver relevant content. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.
privacySection6Intro: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the right to:
privacySection6Point1: Access, update, or correct your personal data
privacySection6Point2: Request deletion of your personal data
privacySection6Point3: Restrict or object to the processing of your data
privacySection6Point4: Request a copy of the information we hold about you
privacySection6Contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: [Insert Email].
privacySection7Content: Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.
privacySection8Content: We retain user data only as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements.
privacySection9Content: If you access our platform from outside our primary operating country, your data may be transferred to and processed in countries with different data protection laws.
privacySection10Content: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on our website, and continued use of our services indicates acceptance of the updated policy.
cookieSection1Content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us recognize your device, remember your preferences, and improve your overall experience on our platform.
cookieSection2PointA1: Necessary for the website to function properly.
cookieSection2PointA2: Enable features like secure login, account access, and transaction processing.
cookieSection2PointB1: Collect information about how users interact with our site.
cookieSection2PointB2: Help us improve platform functionality, speed, and usability.
cookieSection2PointC1: Remember user settings, preferences, and previous activity to enhance your experience.
cookieSection2PointD1: Track your browsing activity to deliver relevant ads and promotional offers.
cookieSection2PointD2: May be set by us or trusted third-party partners.
cookieSection3Point1: Ensure secure and efficient platform operations
cookieSection3Point2: Improve website performance and user experience
cookieSection3Point5: Deliver targeted marketing (with your consent where required)
cookieSection4Content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services, such as analytics providers, payment processors, and advertising networks. We do not control these cookies, and their use is subject to their own privacy policies.
cookieSection5Content: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect certain features and functionality of our platform.
cookieSection5Info: For more information on managing cookies:
cookieSection6Content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and continued use of our services indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

review1.title: Amazing Results!
review1.content: Been using Dragos Capital for 8 months. The AI really works - getting steady 9% monthly returns. Platform is easy to use.
review1.author: Ahmed Moustafa

review2.title: Very Professional Service
review2.content: Great platform with excellent customer support. The AI strategies are well-researched and profitable. Highly recommend for serious traders.
review2.author: Omar Al-Rashid

review3.title: Simple and Effective
review3.content: Love how easy it is to track my investments. The AI does all the complex work while I monitor performance. Much better than traditional trading.
review3.author: Khalid Al-Zahra

review4.title: Consistent Profits
review4.content: The market insights are really helpful. I understand trends better now and the AI system delivers consistent profits every month.
review4.author: Hassan Al-Mahmoud
